Thaus Menahees tuaj huv lub nroog Tilexas tuaj, nwg tua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Tapuas  hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob cheebtsaam ibncig lub nroog ntawd puamtsuaj taag, rua qhov cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog tsi kaam zwm rua nwg. Nwg tseem muab cov quaspuj kws taabtom suab mivnyuas phais plaab huv tuabsi.

Thaus Uxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau peb caug cuaj xyoos lawm, Nkadis tug tub Menahees maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis kaav tau kaum xyoo.
Manahees ua txhum rua tug TSWV, nwg ua phem ua qas ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas kws yog Nenpas tug tub kws coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum taag nwg simneej.

Tilas Pilexes kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Axilias tau tuaj tua cov Yixalayees, Menahees muab tau peb caug yim taas nyaj rua Tilas Pilexes, thov nwg paab Menahees kuas muaj cuabkaav tswj tau lub tebchaws nyob ruaj khov.

Menahees tau tej nyaj ntawd lug ntawm cov Yixalayees kws npluanuj, nwg yuam kuas puab ib tug muab tsib caug dlaim nyaj rua nwg coj moog rua Tilas Pilexes; yog le ntawd, Tilas Pilexes txhaj rov qaab moog rua peg nwg lub tebchaws lawm.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Menahees ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Menahees tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log, hab nwg tug tub Pekahiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Uxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau tsib caug xyoo lawm, Menahees tug tub Pekahiyas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis kaav tau ob xyoos.
Pekahiyas ua txhum rua tug TSWV, nwg ua phem ua qas ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas kws yog Nenpas tug tub kws coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum.

Pekahiyas ib tug tubrog kws hu ua Pekas, nwg yog Lemaliyas tug tub txawm ntxeev sab rua nwg hab coj tau tsib caug leej tubrog huv lub nroog Nkile-as tuaj muab Pekahiyas tua tuag rua huv chaav faajxwm  ntawm lub loog huv lub nroog Xamalis, ces Pekas txawm ua vaajntxwv hloov Pekahiyas chaw.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Pekahiyas ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.

Thaus Uxiyas ua vaajnxtwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau tsib caug ob xyoos lawm, Lemaliyas tug tub Pekas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis kaav tau neeg nkaum xyoo.
Pekas ua txhum rua tug TSWV, nwg ua phem ua qas ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas kws yog Nenpas tug tub kws coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum.

Ntu kws Pekas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws, Vaajntxwv Tikelas Pilexes kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias tuaj txeeb tau lub nroog Iyoos, Anpees Npethes Ma-akas, Yanau-as, Kedes, Haxus hab cheebtsaam Nkile-as, Kalilais hab Nathalis. Hab nteg tau cov tuabneeg coj moog rua peg tebchaws Axilias lawm.
Thaus Uxiyas tug tub Yauthaas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau neeg nkaum xyoo, Elas tug tub Hauseyas ntxeev sab muab Vaajntxwv Pekas tua tuag, hab nwg ua vaajntxwv hloov Pekas chaw.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Pekas ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Thaus Lemaliyas tug tub Pekas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau ob xyoos lawm, Uxiyas tug tub Yauthaas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas
thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum rau xyoo. Nwg nam hu ua Yelusas kws yog Xadaus tug ntxhais.
Yauthaas ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV lub sab nyam, ib yaam le nwg txiv Uxiyas ua.

Tabsis nwg tsi muab tej chaw teev dlaab rhuav povtseg, tej tuabneeg txhaj pheej moog tua tsaj fij hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua ntawm tej chaw teev dlaab ntawd. Yauthaas yog tug kws ua lub Roojvaag Qaumteb ntawm lub Tuamtsev.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Yauthaas ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Ntu kws Yauthaas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws, yog thawj zag kws tug TSWV ca Vaajntxwv Lexees kws kaav lub tebchaws Xilias hab Vaajntxwv Pekas kws kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tuaj tua cov Yudas.
Yauthaas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas huv Daviv lub nroog. Hab nwg tug tub Ahas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Lemaliyas tug tub Pekas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau kaum xyaa xyoo lawm, Yauthaas tug tub Ahas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas

thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum rau xyoo. Nwg tsi ua lub neej zoo ib yaam le nwg yawmkoob kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv ua; hab nwg tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv lub sab nyam,

nwg ua lub neej lawv le cov Yixalyees tej vaajntxwv ua. Nwg muab nwg tug tub tua hlawv fij rua tej mlom. Nwg ua phem ua qas ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws ua ntej kws cov Yixalyees lug nyob.
Ahas tua tsaj fij hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua ntawm tej chaw teev dlaab sau tej pov roob hab huv tej qaab ntoos.
Vaajntxwv Lexees kws kaav tebchaws Xilias hab Vaajntxwv Pekas kws kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees txawm tuaj vij tua lub nroog Yeluxalees, tabsis obtug tua tsi yeej Ahas.

(Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Edoos  rov tuaj tua yeej hab kaav lub nroog Elas, nwg txhaj muab cov Yudas ntab tawm huv lub nroog ntawd moog. Cov Edoos txawm lug nyob huv lub nroog Elas txug naj nub nua).

Ahas khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Vaajntxwv Tikelas Pilexes kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias has tas, “Kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai, thov koj tuaj paab kuv kuas dlim ntawm tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Xilias hab tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees kws tuaj tua kuv.”
Ahas muab tej nyaj tej kub huv lub Tuamtsev hab huv lub loog, coj moog pub rua Vaajntxwv Tilas Pilexes.
Tilas Pilexes txaus sab paab Ahas, nwg txhaj coj nwg cov tubrog tuaj tua hab txeeb lub nroog Damaxes, nteg cov tuabneeg coj moog rua huv Kis hab muab Vaajntxwv Lexees tua.

Thaus Vaajntxwv Ahas moog cuag Vaajntxwv Tikelas Pilexes huv lub nroog Damaxes, nwg pum ib lub thaaj fij, nwg txawm xaa xuv rov lug qha rua tug povthawj Uliyas has txug qhov kws luas ua lub thaaj ntawd txhua yaam le caag rua Uliyas.
Yog le ntawd, Uliyas txhaj ua ib lub thaaj zoo ib yaam le lub kws Ahas pum ntawd. Uliyas tub txua tau lub thaaj ntawd lawm, Ahas maam lug txug.
Thaus Ahas rov peg lub nroog Damaxes lug txug, nwg pum lub thaaj tub tav lawm,
yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tua tsaj hab muab nplej rua sau lub thaaj hlawv fij, muab cawv txiv maab hab ntshaav laub rua sau lub thaaj fij ua kev sis raug zoo.

Ahas muab lub thaaj tooj kws nyob ntawm lub thaaj kws ua tshab hab lub Tuamtsev kis nruab nraab tshem moog tso rua ntawm nwg lub thaaj kws ua tshab saab peg. Lub thaaj tooj ntawd tub muab fij rua tug TSWV lawm.

Vaajntxwv Ahas has rua Uliyas has tas, “Koj siv kuv lub thaaj luj nuav hlawv tej khoom kws vaajntxwv hab cov pejxeem coj tuaj fij thaus sawv ntxuv hab thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, tsi has tej tsaj lossis tej nplej, hab tej cawv txiv maab kws cov pejxeem coj tuaj fij. Muab cov tsaj tua hlawv fij, muab cov ntshaav laub rua sau lub thaaj, tabsis tseg lub thaaj tooj rua kuv tau moog nug tug TSWV.”
Uliyas ua lawv le Vaajntxwv saamfwm rua nwg lawm.

Vaajntxwv Ahas muab cov yag tooj kws siv huv lub Tuamtsev kws txawb rua sau cov tsheb tooj txav, hab muab tshem tawm. Hab nwg tseem muab lub rhawv tooj kws txawb rua sau kaum ob tug nyuj tooj tsaws moog txawb rua ntawm qhov chaw kws luas muab txag zeb pua.

Ahas xaav ua kuas hum Vaajntxwv Tilas Pilexes kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias sab xwb, nwg txhaj muab chaav kws luas ua txuas rua ntawm lub loog lauj povtseg hab nwg thaiv txujkev kws vaajntxwv moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Ahas ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Ahas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas huv Daviv lub nroog, hab nwg tug tub Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Ahas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau kaum ob xyoos lawm, Elas tug tub Hauseyas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis kaav tau cuaj xyoos.
Hauseyas ua txhum rua tug TSWV, tabsis nwg tsi ua txhum luj npaum le cov vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees ua ntej nwg.
Thaus Vaajntxwv Samanexes kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias tuaj tua Hauseyas; Hauseyas txhaj zwm rua Samanexes hab naj xyoo them se rua nwg.

Tabsis tau tsi ntev tom qaab nuav, Hauseyas khaiv tuabneeg moog thov Vaajntxwv Xaus kws kaav lub tebchaws Iziv  tuaj paab nwg, kuas nwg tsi tau naj xyoo them se rua Vaajntxwv Samanexes kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias. Thaus Samanexes paub le ntawd, nwg txhaj nteg Hauseyas moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.
Samanexes tuaj tua cov Yixalayees hab vij lub nroog Xamalis tau peb xyoos

txwm nkaus rua xyoo cuaj kws Hauseyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, ces cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv  txhaj txeeb tau lub nroog Xamalis hab nteg cov Yixalayees moog rua peg tebchaws Axilias lawm. Nwg coj cov Yixalayees ntawd ibtxha moog nyob rua huv lub nroog Halas, ibtxha moog nyob ze rua ntawm tug Dlej Hanpaules huv cheebtsaam Nkauxaas, hab ibtxha moog nyob rua huv cov Medias tej nroog.

Luas txeeb tau lub nroog Xamalis, vim cov Yixalayees ua txhum rua tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv kws tso puab dlim ntawm Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv hab coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Cov Yixalayees pheej moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv,
hab ua lawv le cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm ntawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg moog lawm tej kevcai, hab coj tej kevcai kws cov Yixalayees  tej vaajntxwv tau rhawv tseg.

Cov Yixalayees ua  tej kws tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tsi nyam, puab ua tej chaw teev dlaab hab teev mlom txhua nrho rua huv puab tej nroog, tsi has nroog luj nroog miv, hab huv puab tej zog huv tuabsi.
Puab txhus tej ncej zeb hab puab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas rua sau tej pov roob, hab huv tej qaab ntoos kws muaj nplooj ntxoov quas nyog,

hab puab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau tej thaaj teev dlaab ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog lawm. Puab ua rua tug TSWV chim, vim puab ua kev phem kev qas
hab tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm kuas tsi xob pe mlom.

Yaav taag lug, tug TSWV khaiv nwg cov tubkhai hab nwg cov cevlug moog ntuag cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas has tas, “Mej ca le tso plhuav mej tej kev phem kev qas tseg, lug coj hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm hab tej kevcai kws kuv muab rua mej cov yawmkoob kws kuv kuas kuv cov cevlug muab qha rua mej.”
Tabsis puab tsi noog lug; puab tawv ncauj ib yaam le puab cov yawmkoob kws tsi ca sab rua tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Puab tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug qha hab puab tsi quavntsej tug TSWV tej lug cog tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob, hab tsi khaws nwg tej lug kws nwg qhuab ntuag puab le. Puab moog pe tej mlom kws tsi muaj qaabhau, hab puab ca le moog ua dlog ua dlig tsi muaj qaabhau le lawm. Puab ua lawv le lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig puab tej kevcai kws tug TSWV txwv tsi pub puab ua.

Puab ua txhum rua tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai, puab muab kub nchuav ua ob tug mlom nyuj, hab ib tug mlom quaspuj Aselas rua puab pe; puab tseem pe tej nubqub sau nruab ntug hab pe tug mlom Npa-aas huv tuabsi.
Puab muab puab tej tub hab tej ntxhais tua hlawv txi dlaab; puab moog saib teg, saib yaig hab puab txhobtxwm moog ua kev phem kev qas taabmeeg tug TSWV, txhaj ua rua tug TSWV chim rua puab.
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj chim heev rua cov Yixalayees, hab muab puab ntab tawm ntawm nwg moog, tug TSWV tsuas tseg cov Yudas xwb.
Txawm yog cov Yudas los puab tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai le hab; puab ua lawv le tej kevcai kws cov Yixalayees xyum ntawm lwm tsaav tuabneeg lug.

Tug TSWV muab taagnrho Yixalayees cov xeebntxwv tso povtseg huv tuabsi, nwg rau txim rua puab hab muab puab cob rua cov yeebncuab kws ua nruj ua tsiv txhais teg moog txug thaus tug TSWV ntab puab tawm ntawm nwg moog.

Thaus tug TSWV muab cov Yixalayees cais tawm ntawm cov Yudas moog lawm, cov Yixalayees txawm moog tsaa Nenpas tug tub Yelaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv kaav puab. Yelaunpau-aas txhaj ua rua cov Yixalayees tso tug TSWV tseg, hab coj puab moog ua kev txhum luj kawg nkaus.
Puab txawm ua txhum ib yaam le Yelaunpau-aas hab puab pheej ua tej kev txhum kws nwg ua ntawd

moog txug thaus tug TSWV muab puab ntab tawm ntawm nwg moog, lawv le cov cevlug kws yog nwg cov tubkhai tau qha tseg lawm. Yog le ntawd, luas txhaj tuaj nteg cov Yixalayees coj moog rua peg tebchaws Axilias, hab puab tseem nyob peg lug txug naj nub nua.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias coj cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Kus, Ivas, Hamas hab Xefavais kws nyob huv tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj nyob huv cov Yixalayees tej zej zog, hab tej nroog huv Xamalis,  hloov cov Yixalayees kws luas nteg coj moog rua lwm tebchaws lawm.
Thaus puab nyavnyuas tuaj nyob, puab tsi pehawm tug TSWV, tug TSWV txhaj tso tsuv ntxhuav lug tum puab tuag ibtxha lawm.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias nov has tas cov tuabneeg kws nwg tso moog nyob nraag lub nroog Xamalis tsi paub tug vaajtswv kws kaav lub tebchaws ntawd txuj kevcai, tug vaajtswv ntawd txhaj tso tsuv ntxhuav lug tum puab.
Vaajntxwv txhaj has tas, “Ca le xaa cov povthawj kws peb nteg lug nuav ib tug rov qaab moog nyob nraag hab tsaa nwg  ua tug qha tug vaajtswv kws kaav lub tebchaws ntawd tej kevcai rua puab.”

Yog le ntawd, cov povthawj kws cov Axilias nteg tau huv lub nroog Xamalis lug ib tug txhaj tau rov moog nyob huv lub nroog Npethees, hab qha tug TSWV txuj kevcai rua puab kuas puab paub pehawm tug TSWV.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis tseem pheej puab mlom rua puab pe lawv le puab ibtxwm ua, hab puab coj tej mlom ntawd moog tso rua ntawm tej chaw kws cov Yixalyees ua tseg lawm. Puab cov ntawd nyag puab nyag mlom rua huv tej nroog kws puab nyob:
cov Npanpiloos puab tug mlom Xukaus Npenaus; cov Kus puab tug mlom Nenkas; cov Hamas puab tug mlom Asimas;
cov Ivas puab tug mlom Nihas hab tug mlom Tatas, hab cov Xefavais muab puab cov mivnyuas tua hlawv txi rua tug mlom Alamelej hab tug mlom Anameles.
Tabsis puab tseem pehawm tug TSWV, hab tsaa puab cov tuabneeg ua povthawj moog nyob rua huv tej tsev teev dlaab, hab muab suavdlawg tej khoom fij rua dlaab.
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj pehawm tug TSWV hab teev puab tej vaajtswv lawv le txuj kevcai kws puab coj peg puab lub tebchaws.

Naj nub nua, puab tseem coj puab txuj qub kevcai. Puab tsi pehawm tug TSWV lossis tsi ua lawv le tej kevcai kws tug TSWV muab rua Yakhauj tug kws muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Yixalayees cov xeebntxwv lawm.
Tug TSWV coglug hab saamfwm rua puab has tas, “Mej tsi xob pe luas tej vaajtswv, tsi xob hawm lossis tu lossis tua tsaj fij rua tej vaajtswv ntawd.
Mej ca le noog kuv lug, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, mej yuavtsum pehawm hab tua tsaj fij rua kuv xwb.
Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug kws kuv sau tseg rua mej lawm. Mej tsi xob pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv,
mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua mej, hab tsi xob pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, mej yuavtsum noog kuv lug, kuv txhaj yuav cawm mej kuas dlim ntawm mej cov yeebncuab txhais teg.”
Tabsis cov tuabneeg ntawd tsi noog tug TSWV lug, puab tseem pheej ua lawv le puab tej qub kevcai xwb.
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj pehawm tug TSWV hab pe puab tej mlom huv tuabsi; naj nub nua los puab tej xeebntxwv tseem pheej ua ib yaam le ntawd.
Thaus Elas tug tub Hauseyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau peb xyoos lawm, Ahas tug tub Hexekiyas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas
thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau neeg nkaum cuaj xyoos. Nwg nam yog Xakhaliyas tug ntxhais Anpiyas.
Hexekiyas ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV lub sab nyam, ib yaam le nwg yawmkoob kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv ua.

Hexekiyas rhuav tej chaw teev dlaab, tsoo tej ncej zeb hab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas povtseg. Nwg tseem muab tug naab tooj Nehutaas kws Mauxes nchuav tsoo tawg taag povtseg hab. Cov Yixalayees pheej hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab fij rua tug naab tooj ntawd lug txug thaus lub sijhawm ntawd le.

Hexekiyas ca sab rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv heev; cov vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, tsi has cov kws kaav ua ntej nwg lossis tom qaab nwg, tsi muaj ib tug ca sab rua tug TSWV npaum le Hexekiyas,
Hexekiyas muab sab npuab tug TSWV, noog nwg lug hab coj lawv le tej kevcai kws nwg muab cob rua Mauxes lawm.
Tug TSWV nrug nraim Hexekiyas, hab txhua yaam kws nwg ua puavleej ua tau tav. Nwg ntxeev sab hab tsi kaam zwm rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias.
Nwg tua yeej cov Filitees kws nyob txhua qhov, tsi has tej zog luj zog miv lossis tej nroog luj nroog miv, losloov lub nroog Nkaxas hab cheebtsaam kws nyob ibncig ntawd huv tuabsi.

Thaus Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau plaub xyoos, hab Hauseyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau xyaa xyoo, ces Vaajntxwv Samanexes kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias txawm tuaj rua huv tebchaws Yixalayees hab vij lub nroog Xamalis.
Samanexes vij lub nroog Xamalis tau peb xyoos, nwg maam le txeeb tau; thaus kws Hexekiyas kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau rau xyoo hab Hauseyas kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau cuaj xyoos.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias  txawm nteg cov Yixalyees coj moog rua peg tebchaws Axilias lawm. Nwg coj cov Yixalayees ibtxha moog nyob huv lub nroog Halas, ibtxha moog nyob ze ntawm tug Dlej Hanpules huv cheebtsaam Nkauxaas hab ibtxha moog nyob huv cov Medias tej nroog.

Luas txeeb tau lub nroog Xamalis, rua qhov cov Yixalayees tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv lug, puab tsi ua lawv le tej lug cog tseg hab tej kevcai kws tug TSWV muab cob rua nwg tug tubkhai Mauxes kuas muab qha rua puab lawm.
Thaus Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau kaum plaub xyoos, Vaajntxwv Xenakhelis kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias txawm tuaj tua cov Yudas tej nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv khov kho.

Hexekiyas txhaj xaa xuv moog rua Xenakhelis huv lub nroog Lakhis has tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum lawm, thov koj ca le thim tubrog rov qaab; koj xaav kuas kuv them nyaj npaum le caag rua koj, kuv yuav them npaum ntawm.” Vaajntxwv txhaj teb has tas, kuas Hexekiyas xaa kaum taas nyaj hab ib taas kub tuaj.
Yog le ntawd, Hexekiyas txhaj muab taagnrho tej nyaj huv Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev hab huv vaajntxwv lub loog;
hab nwg tev cov kub kws vuam rua lub Tuamtsev tej qhovrooj, hab tej ncej qhovrooj huv tuabsi nqaa moog rua Xenakhelis.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias txhaj tso nwg peb tug thawj tubrog coj ib paab tubrog coob heev huv lub nroog Lakhis tuaj tua Hexekiyas huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Thaus puab tuaj txug ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees, puab tsuam yeej rua huv txujkev ntawm qhov chaw ntus ntaub kws npuas tug kwj dleg kws ndlwg ntawm lub paag dlej saab peg lug.

Ces puab khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas, Hexekiyas tso peb tug numtswv moog cuag puab; peb tug numtswv ntawd yog: Hilekiyas tug tub Eliyakees kws yog tug saib lub loog, Senpenas kws yog tug teev ntawv hab Axafes tug tub Yau-as kws yog tug ceev tej ntaub ntawv.
Cov thawj tubrog Axilias muaj ib tug has rua peb tug numtswv ntawd has tas, “Vaajntxwv xaav paub saib dlaabtsi ua rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas pheej ca sab?”
Nwg has tas, “Mej xaav has tas, lub ncauj has, ces txawm yuav kovyeej ib yaam le ib paab tubrog tuaj tua nua los? Leejtwg yuav paab mej tawmtsaam cov Axilias?

Mej xaav has tas cov Iziv yuav paab mej, tabsis cov Iziv tsuas zoo ib yaam le tug lojkov kws muab ua paas nreg xwb, nwg yuav luv hab chob mej teg. Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd rua txhua tug tuabneeg kws ca sab rua nwg.”

Cov Axilias tug thawj tubrog has ntxiv tas, “Tej zag mej yuav has rua kuv tas, mej ca sab rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv? Tub yog Hexekiyas muab tej chaw hab tej thaaj fij rhuav, thaus nwg has kuas cov Yudas hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog pehawm tug TSWV ntawm lub thaaj fij huv lub nroog Yeluxalees xwb?
Kuv tuav kuv tug vaajntxwv lub npe has rua mej tas, yog mej nrhav tau tuabneeg, kuv yuav muab ob txheeb tug neeg rua mej caij.

Mej tub kov tsi yeej kuv tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias tug thawj tubrog kws coj paab nyuas tubrog tsawg tsawg nuav, ua caag mej tseem yuav kuas cov Iziv coj tsheb neeg hab tubrog caij neeg tuaj paab mej!
Mej xaav has tas, kuv tuaj tua hab rhuav mej lub tebchaws, tug TSWV tsi paab kuv nua los? Tub yog tug TSWV kuas kuv tuaj tua hab rhuav mej lub tebchaws ntaag.”

Ces Eliyakees, Senpenas hab Yau-as txhaj teb tug thawj tubrog ntawd has tas, “Koj tsi xob has lug Henplais, koj has lug Alamais los peb yeej paub hab, rua qhov cov pejxeem kws nyob sau tej ntsaa yeej, puavleej nov tej lug kws koj has.”

Tug thawj tubrog ntawd teb le nuav: “Mej xaav has tas, kuv tug vaajntxwv khaiv kuv tuaj has tej lug nuav rua mej hab mej tug vaajntxwv xwb nua los? Kuv has rua cov pejxeem kws nyob sau tug ntsaa yeej huv tuabsi, rua qhov puab yuav noj puab tej quav hab haus puab tej zig ib yaam le mej hab ntaag.”
Ces cov Axilias tug thawj tubrog sawv tseeg qw ua lug Henplais has tas, “Mej suavdlawg ca le noog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias tej lug!
Nwg has tas, mej tsi xob ca Hexekiyas ntxag tau mej, nwg yeej yuav paab tsi tau mej le.
Tsi xob ca Hexekiyas ntxag tau mej kuas ca sab rua tug TSWV. Tsi xob xaav has tas tug TSWV yuav cawm kuas mej dlim hab tsi pub lub nroog nuav poob rua cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv txhais teg,

tsi xob noog Hexekiyas lug. Cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv kuas mej ca le zwm rua nwg. Nwg yuav pub rua mej tau noj tej txiv maab hab txiv ncuav pas huv mej tej vaaj, hab tau haus tej dlej huv mej tej qhov tshij

moog txug nub kws vaajntxwv coj mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws zoo ib yaam le mej lub. Lub tebchaws ntawd muaj txiv maab ua cawv, muaj nplej ua ncuav; muaj txiv ntoo roj ua roj hab muaj zib ntaab. Yog mej ua lawv le nwg has, mej yuav tau ua neej nyob tsi tuag. Mej tsi xob ca Hexekiyas ntxag kuas mej ntseeg has tas, tug TSWV yuav cawm kuas mej dlim.
Puas muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg kws puab tug vaajtswv cawm tau puab dlim ntawm cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv lub fwjchim?
Cov Hamas, cov Alepas, cov Xefavais, cov Henas hab cov Ivas tej vaajtswv nyob qhov twg lawm? Tej vaajtswv ntawd puas cawm tau lub nroog Xamalis?

Mej ca le qha rua kuv saib, tej tebchaws ntawd tej vaajtswv puas cawm tau puab dlim ntawm cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv txhais teg? Ua le caag mej xaav has tas, tug TSWV yuav cawm tau lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav dlim ntawm kuv txhais teg?”
Cov pejxeem nyob ntsag tu tsi has ib lu lug le, rua qhov Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas tsi pub puab teb.
Eliyakees, Senpenas hab Yau-as nyuaj sab heev, puab txawm muab puab tej tsho dlua hab moog pav tej lug kws cov Axilias tug thawj tubrog has ntawd rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas noog.
Thaus Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas nov tej lug ntawd, nwg nyuaj sab heev, nwg dlua rhe nwg lub tsho hab muab ntaub tsaaj lug naav, hab moog rua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev.

Nwg khaiv Eliyakees kws yog tug saib lub loog, Senpenas kws yog tug teev ntawv hab cov povthawj ob peb leeg kuas moog cuag tug cev Vaajtswv lug Yaxayas kws yog Amauxes tug tub. Puab puavleej naav ntaub tsaaj huv tuabsi.

Vaajntxwv kuas puab moog has rua Yaxayas has tas, “Nub nua yog nub kws peb raug kev txomnyem, peb taabtom raug txim hab poob ntsejmuag. Peb zoo ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws nwg tsi muaj zug yug nwg tug mivnyuas.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias khaiv nwg ib tug thawj tubrog tuaj thuam Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob. Thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv leeg paub hab rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj thuam nwg ntawd. Yog le ntawd, koj ca le thov Vaajtswv paab peb cov kws tseem seem nyob nuav.”
Thaus Yaxayas nov tej lug kws Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas has lawm,
nwg txhaj kuas puab rov moog has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Tug TSWV kuas koj tsi xob nyuaj sab rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias tej lug thuam kws has tas, tug TSWV paab tsi tau koj.

Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias nov lug foob lug cua, ces nwg yuav rov moog rua peg nwg lub tebchaws, hab tug TSWV yuav ua kuas luas muab nwg tua rua peg nwg lub tebchaws.”
Cov Axilias tug thawj tubrog paub has tas, vaajntxwv tawm huv lub nroog Lakhis moog tua lub nroog Linas kws nyob tsi dleb ntawd; nwg txawm moog nrug vaajntxwv saablaaj.

Cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv nov has tas, Vaajntxwv Tihakas kws kaav lub tebchaws Sudaas, coj ib paab tubrog Iziv tuaj tua nwg lawm. Nwg txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas kws kaav lub tebchaws Yudas
has tas, “Tsi xob ca tug Vaajtswv kws koj ca sab rua ntxag tau koj has tas, koj yuav tsi poob rua kuv txhais teg le.
Nyaj koj nov tej kws cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv tau ua rua tej tebchaws kws nwg xaav muab ua kuas puamtsuaj ntawd lawm. Koj xaav has tas, koj yuav dlim nua los?

Kuv cov yawmkoob tub ua rua lub nroog Nkauxaas, Halaas, Lexes puamtsuaj taag, hab tua cov tuabneeg Npethedees kws nyob huv lub nroog Telaxes tuag taag, hab yeej tsi muaj ib tug vaajtswv nyob qhov twg lug paab cov tuabneeg ntawd dlim le.
Cov vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Hamas, lub nroog Alepas, lub nroog Xefavais, lub nroog Henas hab Ivas dlua twg taag lawm?”
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas txais tsaab ntawv ntawm cov xaa ntawv tuaj lug nyeem. Nwg coj tsaab ntawv moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab muab nthuav rua ntawm tug TSWV xubndlag,

hab thov has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, koj nyob sau koj lub zwmtxwv ntawm ob tug qhelunpees kis nruab nraab, koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog tug Vaajtswv kws kaav taagnrho tej tebchaws huv nplajteb nuav. Koj yog tug kws tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb.
Tug TSWV, thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib tej xwm kws lug raug peb. Thov leeg paub tej lug kws Xenakhelis thuam koj kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj sa nyob.
Tug TSWV, peb paub has tas cov Axilias cov vaajntxwv tau tua ntau tsaav tuabneeg hab rhuav puab tej tebchaws puamtsuaj taag nyob qhuav nkuag ca,
hab muab puab tej mlom kws tsi yog vaajtswv hlawv povtseg taag, tej vaajtswv ntawd yog luas muab pobzeb hab muab ntoo txua xwb.

Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, nwgnuav thov koj paab peb kuas dlim ntawm cov Axilias txhais teg, txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb txhaj yuav paub has tas, tsuas yog koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv.”
Tom qaab ntawd Yaxayas xaa xuv moog has rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas paub has tas tug TSWV tub nov vaajntxwv tej lug thov lawm,
tug TSWV has tas, “Xenakhelis, lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav luag koj plig hab nyos koj.
Koj puas paub has tas, koj saib tsi taug hab thuam leejtwg? Tub yog koj saib tsi taug hab tsi fwm kuv kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv ntaag!

Koj khaiv koj cov tuabneeg xaa xuv tuaj has khaav ntxhas rua kuv tas, koj cov tubrog caij tsheb neeg moog txeeb tau tej roob sab huv tebchaws Lenpanoos. Koj khaav has tas koj muab cov ntoo cab kws sab tshaaj hab cov ntoo thuv kws zoo nkauj sau ntuv huv tuabsi povtseg, hab koj moog txug huv lub plawv zoov nujtxeeg kws dleb heev.
Koj khaav has tas, koj tau moog khawb qhov tshij hab haus tej dlej huv luas tej tebchaws hab coj koj cov tubrog moog tsuj tug Dlej Niles nraag tebchaws Iziv nqhuab hlo.

“Koj tsi tau nov has tas kuv tub npaaj tej nuav ntev lug lawm nua los? Nwgnuav kuv ua lawv le kuv tau has tseg. Kuv pub koj muaj fwjchim rhuav tej nroog kws luas txhim ntsaa yeej khov kho ntawd qaug taag.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej nroog ntawd, tsi muaj zug le, puab ntshai heev ua ib ce tshee nyo. Puab zoo ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag kws tuaj huv tej teb lossis ib yaam le tej yub nroj kws tuaj sau tej ruv tsev kws raug cov cua kub saab nubtuaj tuaj ntsawj ua rua tej nplooj  qhuav nkig nkuav.
“Tabsis kuv paub koj lub sab taag lawm, txawm yog koj yuav ua ib yaam dlaabtsi hab yuav moog qhov twg los kuv yeej paub huv tuabsi. Kuv paub has tas koj chim heev.

Kuv nov has tas, koj chim rua kuv hab khaavtheeb heev, yog le ntawd kuv yuav muab nqailauj lug nqai koj qhovntswg hab muab fwm looj thawb lug saam koj qhovncauj, hab caab koj taug txujkev kws koj tuaj rov qaab.”

Ces Yaxayas has rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas has tas, “Tej xwm kws yuav muaj tshwm lug yog le nuav: Xyoo nuav hab lwm xyoo, koj hab koj cov pejxeem yuav tau noj tej qoobloo kws tsi yog mej cog, tabsis xaab xyoo mej yuav cog hab yuav tau sau. Mej yuav tau cog txiv maab hab tau noj tej txiv maab ntawd.
Cov Yudas kws seem nyob huv lub tebchaws yuav zoo ib yaam le tsob ntoo kws tej caag ntsa aav tub tub hab yuav tawg paaj txi txiv;
rua qhov tug TSWV npaaj sab ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab sau lub Roob Xi-oos ua cov kws seem ntawd.

“Tug TSWV has txug tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias le nuav: ‘Nwg yuav tsi tau tuaj rua huv lub nroog nuav lossis tua tsi tau ib nee tuaj le. Cov tubrog kws muaj dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj, yuav tuaj tsi tau ze lub nroog nuav, hab yuav khawb tsi tau aav meem kuas nce tau rua huv lub nroog.
Nwg yuav taug txujkev kws nwg tuaj rov moog tsev, nwg yuav tsi tau lug rua huv lub nroog nuav. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Kuv yuav tiv thaiv hab tsomkwm lub nroog nuav, kuas kuv txhaj tau ntsejmuag hab kuas muaj lawv le tej lug kws kuv tau cog tseg rua kuv tug tubkhai Daviv lawm.’ ”
Mo ntawd tug TSWV ib tug timtswv lug tua cov tubrog Axilias huv puab lub yeej tuag ib puas yim caum tsib txheeb leej. Thaus kaaj ntug puab cov tubrog tuag pawg lug ca xwb.
Xenakhelis kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Axilias txhaj le thim nwg cov tubrog rov moog rua peg lub nroog Nineves lawm.

Muaj ib nub, thaus nwg taabtom moog pe nwg tug mlom Nilaus huv lub tsev teev mlom, ces nwg ob tug tub kws yog Alameles hab Salexes txawm nqaa ntaaj moog muab nwg tua tuag, hab obtug tsiv moog rua tebchaws Alalaj lawm. Nwg tug tub kws hu ua Exahadoos txhaj ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus ntawd Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas mob nyaav heev hab yuav tuag. Ces Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws yog Amauxes tug tub, txawm tuaj saib Hexekiyas hab has rua nwg tas, “Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Koj ca le npaaj txhua yaam kuas txhij rua lub tebchaws, rua qhov koj yuav tsi zoo. Koj yeej yuav tuag xwb.’ ”
Ces Hexekiyas txawm tig xubndlag rua tim phaab ntsaa hab thov has tas,
“Tug TSWV, thov koj ncu has tas, kuv ua koj teg num ntawm lub sab ncaaj nceeg, muab sab npuab koj, hab ua txhua yaam lawv le koj xaav kuas kuv ua.” Ces Hexekiyas txawm quaj tu sab heev.
Thaus Yaxayas tseem moog tsi tau dlhau lub tshaav puam ntawm vaajntxwv lub loog, tug TSWV txawm has kuas Yaxayas

rov moog has rua Hexekiyas tug kws kaav tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg hab has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog koj yawmkoob Daviv tug Vaajtswv, kuv nov koj tej lug thov hab pum koj tej kua muag lawm, kuv yuav khu koj kuas zoo, peb nub sau nuav koj yuav tau moog rua huv kuv lub Tuamtsev.

Kuv yuav ntxiv noobnyoog kaum tsib xyoos rua koj. Kuv yuav paab koj hab lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav kuas dlim ntawm cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv txhais teg. Kuv yuav tsomkwm lub nroog nuav, kuas kuv txhaj tau ntsejmuag, hab kuas muaj lawv le tej lug kws kuv tau cog tseg rua kuv tug tubkhai Daviv lawm.”
Yaxayas kuas vaajntxwv cov tubkhai muab txiv ncuav pas tsoo qhwv vaajntxwv lub rwj, ces nwg yuav zoo.
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas nug has tas, “Puas yuav muaj dlaabtsi ua cim qha rua kuv paub has tas, tug TSWV yuav khu kuv hab peb nub sau nuav kuv yuav tau moog rua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev?”

Yaxayas teb has tas, “Tug TSWV yuav ua ib qho cim qha rua koj paub has tas, nwg yuav ua lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm. Koj xaav kuas tug TSWV ua rua tug dluab ntawm tug ntaiv nce moog kaum qeb lossis nqeg lug kaum qeb?”
Hexekiyas teb has tas, “Kuj yoojyim ca tug dluab nce moog kaum qeb, tabsis kuv thov tug TSWV ua kuas tug dluab nqeg rov lug kaum qeb.”

Yaxayas thov tug TSWV, hab tug TSWV ua rua tug dluab ntawm tug ntaiv  Cov tuabneeg kws txawj ntse saab kev tshawb tej yaam kws tshwmsim yaav taag lug has tas, tug ntaiv kws has huv nqai nuav, yog ua tshwjxeeb lug qha txug lub sijhawm. kws Vaajntxwv Ahas ua, nqeg rov lug kaum qeb.

Thaus ntawd Npaladaas tug tub Melaudas Npaladaas kws ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos nov has tas Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas mob, nwg txhaj sau ib tsaab ntawv hab xaa ib cov khoom tuaj pub rua Hexekiyas.

Hexekiyas tog txais puab hab coj puab moog ncig saib nwg tej txhaab nyaj txhaab kub, tej txumlom, tej roj tsw qaab hab nwg tej cuabyeej ua rog. Tsi tshuav ib yaam dlaabtsi huv nwg tej txhaab lossis huv nwg lub tebchaws kws nwg tsi tau coj puab moog saib le.

Ces Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tuaj cuag Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab nug nwg has tas, “Cov tuabneeg ntawd tuaj qhov twg tuaj hab puab has dlaabtsi rua koj?” Hexekiyas teb has tas, “Puab tuaj tim tebchaws Npanpiloos kws dleb heev tuaj.”
Yaxayas nug has tas, “Puab pum dlaabtsi huv koj lub loog?” Hexekiyas teb has tas, “Puab pum txhua yaam huv tuabsi, tsi tshuav ib yaam nyob huv tej txhaab kws kuv tsi tau qha rua puab le.”
Yaxayas has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus has tas,

muaj ib nub txhua yaam kws nyob huv koj lub loog, hab txhua yaam kws koj cov yawmkoob khwv tseg thaus u lug txug rua naj nub nua, yuav raug luas coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos, yuav tsi tshuav ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Koj cov tub xeebntxwv ibtxha yuav raug luas nteg coj moog, hab muab saam ca ua num huv tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos lub loog.”

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas txawm xaav has tas, thaus kws nwg tseem ua neej nyob, lub tebchaws yuav muaj kev thaajyeeb hab nyob tso sab lug, nwg txhaj teb has tas, “Cov lug kws tug TSWV kuas koj has rua kuv yog lug zoo.”

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas ua, tej kws nwg muaj peevxwm ua, tauv tau lub paag dlej hab khawb tug kwj dleg tso dlej lug rua huv lub nroog, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Hexekiyas tuag hab nwg tug tub Manaxes ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Manaxes ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj kaum ob xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau tsib caug tsib xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Hexinpas.
Manaxes ua txhum rua tug TSWV, nwg ua kev phem kev qas ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog ua ntej nwg tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob lawm.

Manaxes rov txhim khu tej chaw teev dlaab kws nwg txiv Hexekiyas muab rhuav taag lawm. Nwg ua ntau lub thaaj teev tug mlom Npa-aas hab puab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas, ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Ahaj kws kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees ua. Manaxes tseem pe tej nubqub hab.
Manaxes ua tau ntau lub thaaj teev dlaab rua huv lub Tuamtsev, muab teeb rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV has tas, tsimnyog ca ua qhov chaw rua suavdlawg pehawm nwg.
Manaxes ua tau ntau lub thaaj rua ntawm ob lub tshaav puam ntawm lub Tuamtsev ua qhov chaw pe tej nubqub.
Manaxes muab nwg tug tub tua hlawv fij. Nwg ua khawvkoob, ua yeegsiv, saib teg  hab saib yaig. Manaxes ua txhum luj heev rua tug TSWV, tug TSWV txhaj chim rua nwg.

Nwg muab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas lug teeb rua huv lub Tuamtsev ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV has rua Daviv hab Daviv tug tub Xalumoos has tas, “Lub Tuamtsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav, yog qhov chaw kws kuv xaiv tawm ntawm kaum ob xeem Yixalyees lug ua qhov chaw rua suavdlawg tuaj pehawm kuv.

Yog cov Yixalyees noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai kws kuv tug tubkhai Mauxes muab rua puab lawm, kuv yuav tsi pub kuas puab raug ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.”
Tabsis cov Yudas tsi noog tug TSWV lug, Manaxes txhaj coj puab moog ua txhum luj tshaaj cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog ua ntej nwg tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob.
Tug TSWV has rua cov tubkhai kws yog cov cevlug has tas,
“Vaajntxwv Manaxes ua kev phem kev qas luj tshaaj cov tuabneeg Kana-aas ua; qhov kws nwg puab tej mlom ntawd, ua rua nwg coj cov Yudas moog ua txhum.
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, kuv Yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov Yudas, kuas txhua tug kws nov tej xwm nuav yuav xaav tsi thoob le.

Kuv yuav rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees ib yaam le kuv ua rua lub nroog Xamalis, hab ib yaam le kuv ua rua Vaajntxwv Ahaj kws kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees hab nwg cov xeebntxwv. Kuv yuav cheb lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv kuas dlu lug moog ib yaam le lub phaaj kws muab ntxuav taag hab muab so khwb ca.
Kuv yuav tso cov tuabneeg kws seem ntawd tseg, muab puab cob rua puab tej yeebncuab, kuas tua yeej puab hab txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws.
Kuv yuav ua le nuav rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, rua qhov puab ua txhum rua kuv hab ua rua kuv chim, txij thaus kuv coj puab cov yawmkoob tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug txug naj nub nua.”

Manaxes tua cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim coob leej, ua rua ntshaav ndlwg puv nkaus tej kev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees; nwg ua tej kev txhum nuav ntxiv rua tej kws nwg coj cov Yudas moog pe mlom, hab ua txhum rua tug TSWV.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Manaxes ua hab tej kev txhum kws nwg ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Manaxes tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua huv nwg lub loog kws yog lub vaaj Uxas, hab nwg tug tub Amoos ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Amoos ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum ob xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau ob xyoos, nwg nam hu ua Mesulemes hab yog Halus kws nyob huv lub nroog Yaunpas tug ntxhais.
Amoos ua txhum rua tug TSWV ib yaam le nwg txiv Manaxes ua ntaag.
Nwg xyum ua lawv le nwg txiv tug yaam ntxwv, hab nwg pe tej mlom kws nwg txiv pe.
Amoos tso tug TSWV kws yog nwg cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv tseg, hab tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm.
Amoos cov numtswv ntxeev sab rua nwg hab muab nwg tua tuag rua huv nwg lub loog.
Tabsis cov Yudas muab cov tuabneeg kws tua Amoos, tua tuag taag hab tsaa Amoos tug tub Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Amoos ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Luas coj Amoos moog log rua ntawm lub toj ntxaas huv lub vaaj Uxas, hab nwg tug tub Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj yim xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb caug ib xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Yedidas hab yog Adayas kws nyob huv lub nroog Npauxekas tug ntxhais.
Yauxiyas ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV lub sab nyam, nwg ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej kevcai, ib yaam le nwg yawmkoob kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv ua.
Thaus Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv tau kaum yim xyoo, nwg khaiv nwg tug teev ntawv Safas kws yog Axaliyas tug tub hab yog Mesulas tug xeebntxwv moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, nwg has rua Axaliyas has tas,
“Koj moog cuag tug Povthawj Hlub Hilekiyas hab kuas nwg qha tej nyaj kws cov povthawj sau tau thaus cov pejxeem coj tuaj tso rua huv lub Tuamtsev saib tau pistsawg.
Koj kuas nwg muab cov nyaj ntawd coj moog rua cov kws saib cov tuabneeg kws khu lub Tuamtsev. Puab txhaj tau nyaj
them rua cov tuabneeg txua ntoo, cov ua tsev, cov txhim phaab ntsaa, yuav ntoo hab yuav pobzeb lug khu lub Tuamtsev.
Cov kws saib cov ua num, puab yog tuabneeg ncaaj, txhaj tsi kuas puab muab tej ntawv teev tej nyaj kws puab siv lug.”
Safas coj vaajntxwv cov lug moog has rua Hilekiyas, Hilekiyas qha rua Safas has tas, “Kuv pum phoo ntawv kevcai nuav nyob huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev.” Hilekiyas txawm muab phoo ntawv rua Safas nyeem.
Safas rov lug qha rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Koj cov tubkhai tub muab cov nyaj huv lub Tuamtsev cob rua cov kws saib cov tuabneeg kws khu lub Tuamtsev lawm.”
Safas has ntxiv tas, “Phoo ntawv nuav yog Hilekiyas muab rua kuv.” Ces Safas txawm muab nyeem rua vaajntxwv noog.
Thaus vaajntxwv nov tej lug huv phoo ntawv kevcai ntawd, vaajntxwv nyuaj sab heev hab dlua rhe nwg lub tsho,
hab has rua tug Povthawj Hilekiyas, Safas tug tub Ahikas, Mikayas tug tub Anpaus, tug teev ntawv Safas hab Axayas kws yog tug tu vaajntxwv le nuav:

“Mej ca le paab kuv hab paab cov Yudas moog nug tug TSWV txug tej lug huv phoo ntawv nuav saib qha le caag. Tog tug TSWV chim heev rua peb los tub yog peb cov yawmkoob tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav.”

Hilekiyas, Ahikas, Anpaus, Safas hab Axayas txawm moog cuag ib tug quaspuj hu ua Hulidas kws yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees ntawm ceg kaum kws luas ua tshab. (Hulidas tug quasyawg hu ua Saloos kws yog Tivas tug tub hab yog Hahas tug xeebntxwv, nwg yog tug saib cov tsho ntev huv lub Tuamtsev). Puab pav tej lug ntawd rua Hulidas noog.
Nwg kuas puab rov moog cuag vaajntxwv

hab has rua vaajntxwv has tas, tug TSWV has le nuav: “Kuv yuav rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog lawv le tej lug kws sau tseg rua huv phoo ntawv kws vaajntxwv nyeem ntawd.
Puab tau tso kuv tseg hab moog tua tsaj fij rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv, kuv txhaj chim rua tej kws puab ua, hab kuv chim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuv tej kev chim yuav tsi xaam moog sai.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, kuv has le nuav rua vaajntxwv: Thaus koj nov tej lug huv phoo ntawv nuav taag lawm,

koj leeg koj tej kev txhum hab txu fwjchim taabmeeg kuv, koj quaj tu sab hab dlua rhe koj lub tsho, thaus koj paub has tas, kuv yuav rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov tuabneeg huv tuabsi. Kuv yuav ua kuas lub nroog puamtsuaj taag, thaus luas pum luas yuav ntshai heev, hab luas yuav tuav lub nroog nuav lub npe foom tsi zoo. Tabsis vim kuv tub nov koj tej lug thov lawm,
kuv yuav tog kuas koj tuag tsaiv kuv maam le rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees. Kuv yuav ca koj tuag kaaj sab lug.” Puab coj tej lug ntawd moog pav rua Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas noog.
Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas kuas cov Yudas tej thawjcoj hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj cuag nwg,

hab puab ua ke moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, tsi has cov povthawj, cov cevlug hab taagnrho cov pejxeem, tug muaj tug npluag los moog huv tuabsi. Vaajntxwv nyeem taagnrho phoo ntawv coglug kws nrhav tau huv lub Tuamtsev rua suavdlawg noog.

Vaajntxwv sawv ib saab ntawm tug ncej kws cov vaajntxwv ibtxwm sawv coglug rua tug TSWV has tas yuav fwm nwg, ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws, hab ua kuas tau lawv le tej lug cog tseg kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav. Cov pejxeem puavleej leeg lug hab has tas, puab yuav coj lawv le tej lug cog tseg ntawd.

Tom qaab ntawd, Yauxiyas kuas tug Povthawj Hlub Hilekiyas, cov povthawj yau, hab cov kws zuv lub roojvaag kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev moog nqaa txhua yaam kws luas siv teev Npa-aas teev tug mlom quaspuj Aselas hab teev tej nubqub tawm huv lub Tuamtsev moog povtseg. Vaajntxwv muab tej ntawd coj moog hlawv rua nrau ntug nroog kws ze lub Haav Kiloos, hab nwg kuas puab yawm tej tshauv ntawd coj moog pov rua peg lub nroog Npethees.

Nwg muab cov povthawj kws cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv tsaa lug tua tsaj hlawv txi dlaab  rua sau tej thaaj huv cov Yudas tej nroog hab tej chaw kws ze lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab taagnrho cov povthawj kws tua tsaj fij rua Npa-aas, fij rua lub nub, fij lub hli hab tej nubqub sau nruab ntug ntab tawm huv tuabsi moog lawm.
Nwg tshem tug mlom quaspuj Aselas tawm huv lub Tuamtsev moog rua saab nrau ntug nroog, muab hlawv rua huv lub Haav Kiloos, hab muab tsoo ua moov mog mog nphoo rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem tej ntxaa.
Nwg rhuav cov namndlav txivndlav tej chaw huv lub Tuamtsev.  (Yog qhov chaw kws cov quaspuj tuaj ntus tsho rua cov tuabneeg naav moog pe tug mlom quaspuj Aselas.)

Nwg coj cov povthawj kws nyob huv cov Yudas tej nroog lug nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab nwg moog thoob plawg txhua qhov, muab tej thaaj kws cov povthawj tua tsaj hlawv txi dlaab rhuav povtseg huv tuabsi. Nwg rhuav tej thaaj kws luas teev tej dlaab tshis kws nyob ze ntawm lub roojvaag kws yog tug tswv nroog Yausuas ua rua ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv lub nroog.
Cov povthawj nuav, noj tau tej ncuav tsi xyaw keeb kws luas nqaa tuaj rua lwm cov povthawj, tabsis puab tsi muaj feem moog ua num huv lub Tuamtsev.
Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas tseem rhuav lub chaw teev dlaab kws hu ua Taufes huv lub Haav Hinoos, kuas suavdlawg txhaj tsi tau chaw coj puab tej tub tej ntxhais tuaj tua hlawv fij rua tug mlom Maulej lawm.

Nwg muab cov neeg kws cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv muab fij rua lub nub lawm tso moog, hab muab tej tsheb neeg kws puab caij tuaj pe lub nub hlawv povtseg. (Puab tso tej neeg hab tej tsheb neeg ntawd rua huv lub tshaav puam ntawm lub Tuamtsev, ze lub roojvaag kws nyob tsi dleb ntawm tug nom Nathaas Melej lub tsev.)

Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas rhuav tej thaaj kws cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv ua rua sau Vaajntxwv Ahas lub loog, hab nwg tseem muab tej thaaj kws Vaajntxwv Manaxes ua rua huv ob lub tshaav puam ntawm lub Tuamtsev tsoo tawg ntsoog ntxawg  hab coj moog pov rua ntawm lub Haav Kiloos.

Yauxiyas rhuav tej thaaj kws Vaajntxwv Xalumoos ua rua ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees saab nubtuaj, hab ua rua ntawm lub Roob Txiv Ntoo Roj  saab qaabteb kws yog tej chaw pe cov Xidoos tug mlom quaspuj Atates, cov Mau-am tug mlom Khemus, hab cov Amoos tug mlom Maulej.
Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas muab tej ncej zeb tsoo tawg taag, ntuv tug mlom quaspuj Aselas povtseg, hab nwg muab tej pobtxhaa tuabneeg coj moog pov rua tej chaw ntawd.

Yauxiyas muab lub chaw teev dlaab kws Nenpas tug tub kws yog Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas ua rua huv lub nroog Npethees rhuav povtseg huv tuabsi; Yelaunpau-aas yog tug kws coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum. Yauxiyas muab lub thaaj tsoo tawg taag;  Phoo Henplais has tas, muab lub thaaj hlawv. hab nwg tseem muab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas hlawv kub nyab taag.

Tom qaab ntawd, Yauxiyas saib pum ib cov ntxaa nyob sau lub pov roob; nwg txawm kuas luas moog khawb cov pobtxhaa tuabneeg ntawd lug hlawv rua sau lub thaaj. Nwg ua le nuav kuas lub thaaj tsi huv, lawv le tug cev Vaajtswv lug has tseg thaus Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas sawv ntawm lub thaaj ib saab, nub kws puab ua rooj noj rooj haus. Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas tig moog saib pum tug cev Vaajtswv lug  kws qha tej xwm nuav lub ntxaa.

Yauxiyas nug has tas, “Lub ntxaa ntawd yog leejtwg lub?” Cov tuabneeg huv Npethees teb has tas, “Yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag tebchaws Yudas tuaj lub ntxaa, nwg yog tug kws tuaj qha ua ntej has txug tej kws koj tau ua rua lub thaaj nuav.”

Yauxiyas has tas, “Ca nwg nyob nwg, tsi xob khawb tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd cov pobtxhaa tawm.” Yog le ntawd, luas txhaj tsi khawb tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd cov pobtxhaa, hab tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws nyob peg lub nroog Xamalis cov pobtxhaa.

Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas rhuav taagnrho tej chaw teev dlaab kws cov Yixalayees tej vaajntxwv ua tseg rua huv txhua lub nroog thoob plawg tebchaws Yixalayees. Tej kws cov Yixalayees tej vaajntxwv ua ntawd, ua rua tug TSWV chim heev rua puab. Yauxiyas rhuav tej thaaj ntawd ib yaam le nwg rhuav tej kws nyob huv lub nroog Npethees.
Nwg tua cov povthawj kws teev dlaab rua sau tej thaaj kws puab teev dlaab, hab muab puab tej pobtxhaa moog hlawv rua sau txhua lub thaaj, ces nwg txawm rov lug rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.
Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas has rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Mej ca le ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau lawv le tej lug kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv coglug, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv txhaj tau koob meej.”
Txij thaus muaj cov thawjtswj ua cov kaav tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees lug txug thaus cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas muaj vaajntxwv, yeej tsi tau muaj leejtwg ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau luj npaum le zag nuav.
Yauxiyas tub ua vaajntxwv tau kaum yim xyoos lawm, maam rov muaj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas ntab cov Yudas kws txawj saib yaig hab saib teg tawm moog, hab tshem tej thaaj xwmkaab, tej mlom hab txhua yaam cuabyeej kws siv teev dlaab tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab thoob plawg lub tebchaws Yudas moog povtseg, txhaj lawv le tej kevcai kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv kws tug Povthawj Hlub Hilekiyas pum nyob huv lub Tuamtsev.

Tej vaajntxwv kws xub kaav ua ntej Yauxiyas, tsi muaj ib tug kws ua zoo npaum le Yauxiyas. Nwg ua tug TSWV teg num kawg sab kawg ntsws, kawg dlaag zug, hab ua lawv le Mauxes tej kevcai; txij thaus ntawd lug tsi muaj ib tug vaajntxwv ua zoo npaum le nwg lawm.
Txawm le ntawd los tug TSWV tseem chim rua cov Yudas, vim tej kws Vaajntxwv Manaxes ua, hab naj nub nua los tug TSWV txujkev chim tseem tsi tau xaam moog taag.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav ua rua cov Yudas ib yaam le kuv tau ua rua cov Yixalayees lawm. Kuv yuav ntab kuas cov Yudas tawm ntawm kuv moog, ib yaam le kuv tau ntab cov Yixalayees, hab kuv yuav muab lub nroog Yeluxalees kws kuv xaiv ca, hab lub Tuamtsev kws kuv has tas yog lub chaw rua suavdlawg tuaj pehawm kuv tso povtseg.”
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.

Tam kws Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, Falaus Nekaus kws Yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv coj tubrog tuaj paab tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Axilias tua rog peg tug Dlej Efalates. Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas txawm tuaj zuv kev tua Falaus Nekaus ntawm Menkidaus, Yauxiyas txhaj raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog lawm.

Nwg cov tubrog txhaj muab nwg tsaws rua sau tsheb neeg thauj rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas. Cov Yudas txhaj le tsaa Yauxiyas tug tub Yehau-ahas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Yehau-ahas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum peb xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb hlis. Nwg nam hu ua Hamutas hab yog Yelemis kws nyob huv lub nroog Linas tug ntxhais.
Yehau-ahas ua txhum rua tug TSWV, hab nwg ua phem ua qas ib yaam le nwg cov yawmkoob ua.

Nwg kev tswjfwm tebchaws xaus rua thaus Falaus Nekaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv nteg nwg moog kaw rua huv lub nroog Lilas huv tebchaws Hamas, hab kuas cov Yudas them xyaa txheeb tsib puas choj nyaj hab xyaa caum tsib choj kub rua nwg.

Falaus Nekaus tsaa Yauxiyas tug tub Eliyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas hloov nwg txiv Yauxiyas chaw, hab muab Eliyakees hloov npe hu ua Yehauyakees. Vaajntxwv Nekaus coj Yehau-ahas moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab nwg tuag rua nraag lawm.
Vaajntxwv Yehauyakees sau se ntawm cov pejxeem kuas tau nyaj hab kub lug txwm nkaus le Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv kuas puab them.

Thaus Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum ib xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Xenpidas, hab yog Padayas kws nyob huv lub nroog Lumas tug ntxhais.
Yehauyakees ua txhum rua tug TSWV, hab ua phem ua qas ib yaam le nwg cov yawmkoob ua.

Thaus kws Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv, Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj tua lub tebchaws Yudas, hab Yehauyakees zwm rua Nenpukajnexales tau peb xyoos; tabsis tom qaab ntawd Yehauyakees tau ntxeev sab rua Nenpukajnexales.

Tug TSWV tso cov Npanpiloos, cov Xilias, cov Mau-am hab cov Amoos tuaj tua Yehauyakees hab rhuav lub tebchaws Yudas puamtsuaj taag lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua nwg cov tubkhai kws yog cov cev Vaajtswv lug has tas nwg yuav ua le ntawd.
Tej nuav muaj lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws has tas, nwg yuav muab cov Yudas ntab tawm ntawm nwg moog, vim tej kev txhum kws Vaajntxwv Manaxes ua,
hab tua cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim. Tug TSWV yeej zaam tsi tau lub txim kws Manaxes tua tuabneeg ntawd le.
Txhua yaam kws Yehauyakees ua puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Yehauyakees tuag, hab nwg tug tub Yehauyakhees ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Iziv hab nwg cov tubrog tawm tsi tau huv tebchaws Iziv moog rua qhov twg le, rua qhov tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj txeeb tau hab kaav taagnrho cheebtsaam kws yog cov Iziv tug, txij ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates moog ti nkaus rua ntawm cov Iziv tug nrimteb saab qaumteb.

Thaus Yehauyakhees ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas nwg noobnyoog muaj kaum yim xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb hlis. Nwg nam hu ua Nehusetas hab yog Enathaas kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tug ntxhais.
Nwg u txhum rua tug TSWV, hab ua phem ua qas ib yaam le nwg txiv ua.
Lub sijhawm ntawd Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos cov thawj tubrog tau coj tubrog tuaj vij lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus kws cov tubrog taabtom vij lub nroog, Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos txawm tuaj txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalees;

ces Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees hab nwg nam, nwg cov tub, nwg cov numtswv hab cov kws ua num huv lub loog, txhaj zwm rua cov Npanpiloos. Nenpukajnexales ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos tau yim xyoo rua thaus kws nwg nteg Yehauyakhees,

hab nwg nqaa tej khoom tseemceeb huv lub Tuamtsev hab huv lub loog moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm has tas, Nenpukajnexales yuav tuaj tsoo hab nqaa taagnrho tej khoom tseemceeb kws Vaajntxwv Xalumoos muab kub ua rua huv lub Tuamtsev moog.

Nwg coj cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, vaajntxwv tsev tuabneeg hab cov thawjcoj moog huv tuabsi, xaam taagnrho muaj kaum txheeb leej. Dlua le ntawd nwg tseem coj cov tuabneeg kws muaj tswvyim ua txhua yaam num, hab cov kws tooj kws hlau moog huv tuabsi. Nwg tsuas tseg cov tuabneeg pluag nyob huv lub tebchaws Yudas xwb.
Nenpukajnexales coj Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees, nwg nam, nwg cov quaspuj, nwg cov numtswv hab cov Yudas tej thawjcoj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.

Cov tuabneeg tseemceeb kws Nenpukajnexales coj moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos muaj xyaa txheeb leej, hab ib txheeb leej cov kws muaj tswvyim ua txhua yaam num, losloov cov kws tooj kws hlau huv tuabsi, cov nuav puavleej yog cov khov kho hab ua taug tubrog xwb.
Nenpukajnexales tsaa Yehauyakhees tug txiv ntxawm Mataniyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, hab muab Mataniyas hloov npe hu ua Xedekiyas.

Thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum ib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum ib xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Hamutas hab yog Yelemis kws nyob huv lub nroog Linas tug ntxhais.
Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas ua txhum rua tug TSWV, ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees ua.
Tug TSWV chim heev rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab huv tebchaws Yudas, nwg txhaj muab puab ntab tawm ntawm nwg moog lawm.

Xedekiyas ntxeev sab rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos. Yog le ntawd, Nenpukajnexales txhaj txhij tubrog tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees, thaus lub kaum hli ntuj, nub xab kaug kws Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau cuaj xyoos. Puab tuaj tsuam yeej rua ntawm ntug nroog, hab xov ib txheej ntsaa yeej thaiv puagncig lub nroog Yeluxalees,
hab vij lub nroog moog txug thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv tau kaum ib xyoos.
Xyoo ntawd thaus lub plaub hlis ntuj  nub xab cuag, cov pejxeem tsi muaj zaub mov noj hab suavdlawg tshaib plaab heev,

hab tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog raug luas tsoo qee ntu pob taag. Txawm yog cov tubrog Npanpiloos tub vij lub nroog taag lawm los thaus ib taag mo vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tubrog tseem tsiv tawm moog hlaa vaajntxwv lub vaaj, moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws nyob kis nruab nraab ntawm ob tug ntsaa yeej moog rua tom lub Haav Yauladees lawm.
Tabsis cov tubrog Npanpiloos caum puab qaab moog nteg tau Vaajntxwv Xedekiyas ntawm lub taj nraag kws ze lub nroog Yelikaus hab nwg cov tubrog tsiv taag tso nwg tseg.
Thaus puab nteg tau Xedekiyas lawm, puab coj nwg lug cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales ntawm lub nroog Lilas huv cheebtsaam Hamas hab Nenpukajnexales txav txim rua Xedekiyas qhov ntawd.

Nenpukajnexales muab Xedekiyas cov tub tua taabmeeg Xedekiyas, hab Nenpukajnexales kuas luas muab Xedekiyas ob lub qhovmuag kaus povtseg, puab muab saw hlau khi nwg coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.

Thaus Nenpukajnexales ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos tau kaum cuaj xyoos, xyoo ntawd lub tsib hlis ntuj nub xab xyaa, Nenpuxaladaas kws yog vaajntxwv tug tuavxaam hab yog tug thawj tubrog, txawm coj vaajntxwv cov tubrog tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Nwg hlawv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, lub loog, cov numtswv tej vaaj tse, hab taagnrho tej tsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kub nyab taag huv tuabsi,
hab nwg cov tubrog muab tej ntsaa yeej tsoo pob taag.

Nenpuxaladaas nteg cov tuabneeg kws tseem tshuav nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov kws muaj tswvyim ua txhua yaam num  hab coj taagnrho cov kws lug thawj cov Npanpiloos moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Tabsis nwg tseg cov tuabneeg pluag kws tsi muaj laj tsi muaj teb nyob rua huv tebchaws Yudas, hab nwg kuas puab ca le moog ua luas tej laj tej teb hab tu luas tej vaaj txiv maab txiv ntoo.
Cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos tsoo ob tug ncej tooj, tej tsheb, hab lub yag tooj kws nyob ntawm lub Tuamtsev, coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.

Hab puab sau taagnrho tej dluav yawm tshauv, tej thoob rau tshauv thaus puab tu lub thaaj, tej txab txav teebxeeb, cov phab kws rau ntshaav tsaj, tej taig kws hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab, hab tej taig tooj kws siv huv lub Tuamtsev nqaa moog huv tuabsi lawm.
Puab coj txhua yaam kws muab nyaj muab kub ua, tsi has tej taig, tej yag kws rau ncaig tawg,

hab txhua yaam kws Vaajntxwv Xalumoos muab tooj ua tseg rua huv lub Tuamtsev, tsi has ob tug ncej tooj, cov tsheb, hab lub rhawv tooj luj, tej ntawd nyaav heev tsi muaj ib raab teev kws yuav luj tau le.

Ob tug ncej tooj ntawd sis luag zog: ib tug twg sab kaum yim tshim, hab sau ob lub hauv ncej luas ua ob lub paaj sab peb tshim txawb rua sau, luas muab xuv tooj qhab ua saw rig puagncig ob lub hau, hab nchuav ua ob tshaam txiv ntsab pobkws dlai rua sau.
Nenpuxaladaas kws yog tug thawj tubrog nteg Xelayas kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub, Xefaniyas kws yog tug povthawj yau hab peb leeg kws tuav num tseemceeb huv lub Tuamtsev,

nwg nteg tug thawj tubrog kws saib taagnrho cov tubrog, vaajntxwv tsib tug tuavxaam kws tseem nyob huv lub nroog, tug lwm thawj tubrog kws txheeb cov tubrog tej ntaub ntawv hab rau caum leej tuabneeg tseemceeb kws nyob huv lub nroog.
Nenpuxaladaas coj puab moog cob rua tug Vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos ntawm lub nroog Lilas
huv cheebtsaam Hamas. Vaajntxwv kuas luas muab puab ntaus hab tua rua ntawd. Yog le ntawd, luas txhaj coj cov Yudas moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.

Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos tsaa Nkedaliyas kws yog Ahikas tug tub hab yog Safas tug xeebntxwv ua nom kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, hab saib cov Yudas kws tsi raug luas nteg moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos.

Thaus cov Yudas cov numtswv hab cov tubrog kws tsi kaam moog thawj hab zwm rua cov Npanpiloos nov has tas, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos tsaa Nkedaliyas ua nom saib cov Yudas lawm, puab txawm tuaj cuag nwg huv lub nroog Mixepas; cov numtswv ntawd yog Nethaniyas tug tub Yisamayees, Kale-as tug tub Yauhanaas, Xelayas tug tub Tahumes kws nyob huv lub nroog Netaufas, hab Yexaniyas kws nyob huv lub nroog Ma-akas.

Nkedaliyas has rua puab tas, “Kuv has rua mej has tas, mej tsi xob ntshai cov Npanpiloos tej numtswv. Mej ca le nyob tuabywv huv lub tebchaws nuav, hab ua num rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos, mej txhaj yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.”

Xyoos ntawd, thaus lub xyaa hli ntuj, Yisamayees kws yog Nethaniyas tug tub hab yog Elisamas tug xeebntxwv kws yog caajceg vaajntxwv, txawm coj kaum leej tubrog tuaj tua Nkedaliyas, hab nwg tseem muab cov Yixalayees hab cov Npanpiloos kws nrug Nkedaliyas nyob huv lub nroog Mixepas tua tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Cov Yixalayees, tsi has cov muaj cov pluag hab cov thawj tubrog txhaj tsiv moog taag rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm; vim puab ntshai cov Npanpiloos.

Xyoo kws Evimeludas pib ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos, nwg hlub Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees kws kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, nwg txhaj tso Yehauyakhees tawm huv tsev lojcuj. Suav txij nub kws luas nteg Yehauyakhees huv tebchaws Yudas moog txug nub kws luas tso nwg tawm huv tsev lojcuj lug, yog tau peb caug xyaa xyoo rua lub kaum ob hli ntuj nub neeg nkaum xyaa.
Vaajntxwv Evimeludas ua zoo rua Yehauyakhees hab muab nwg saib hlub dlua lwm tug vaajntxwv kws luas nteg moog rua huv tebchaws Npanpiloos.

Yog le ntawd, luas txhaj muab dlua ib cev rig tsho rua Yehauyakhees naav, hloov cev kws nwg naav nyob huv tsev lojcuj, hab nwg naj nub tau nrug vaajntxwv noj mov sau vaajntxwv lub rooj moog taag nwg simneej.
Thaus kws Yehauyakhees tseem ua neej nyob, Vaajntxwv Evimeludas kws kaav lub tebchaws Npanpiloos naj nub muab nyaj rua Yehauyakhees yuav noj yuav naav kuas txaus moog txug nub kws taag nwg simneej.
